Package ro.ubb.olympics.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
ro.ubb.olympics.controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
The controller handling all of the business logic in the application.

    • addParticipation

      public java.util.Optional<Participation> addParticipation​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.Long athleteId, java.lang.Long competitionId, int rank)
      Add a new participation using the corresponding service.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the participation
      athleteId - the ID of an athlete
      competitionId - the ID of a competition
      rank - the rank of the athlete in the competition
      Returns:
      the result of the add operation from the service.
      Throws:
      UnknownIdException - if there is no athlete or competition with the specified IDs.

      public java.util.Optional<Sponsorship> addSponsorship​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.Long competitionId, java.lang.Long sponsorId, int moneyContribution)
      Adds a sponsorship using the corresponding service.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the sponsorship
      competitionId - the ID of the competition
      sponsorId - the ID of the sponsor
      moneyContribution - the amount of money contributed by the sponsor
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • deleteAthlete

      public java.util.Optional<Athlete> deleteAthlete​(java.lang.Long id)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
